GSD.description:
ice: set tx_tstamps when creating new Tx rings via ethtool

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 9eb5fff6b0e78819c758892282da5faa915724d0. For more details please see the references link.
